CSUF Strategic Plan 2024-29




As California State University, Fullerton wraps up the 2018-2023 Strategic Plan, we invite all campus community members â faculty, students, staff, alumni, community members, partners and beyond â to participate in a series of review and reflection activities to help develop Fullerton Forward 2024-2029, Cal State Fullertonâs next Strategic Plan.  These activities are part of the strategic planning process that seek to facilitate a thoughtful transition from our current to our next strategic plan, and to ensure that Fullerton Forward 2024-2029 is built upon the collective vision of all Titan family members.  The strategic planning process will follow a data-driven approach, collecting, analyzing, synthesizing, and integrating the voices, ideas, and wisdom across our community, and will produce a strong foundational framework to guide our work in the next five years. 



YouTube Link to President Virjee Video












CSUF Strategic Plan 2024-2029: Plan Development Timeline

Utilize a DATA-DRIVEN approach to guide the planning process
Engage in REVIEW and REFLECTION of the current Strategic Plan to ensure thoughtful transition to the next plan
Solicit and listen to the VOICES of ALL STAKEHOLDERS on and off campus
Coordinate through a diverse committee to be established in spring 2023 to SYNTHESIZE and INTEGRATE stakeholder voices into the plan 




Spring 2023
CAMPUS
                    Review & Reflection



January

February

 Campus-wide REVIEW of Strategic Plan 2018-2023 progress

March

 Campus-wide VISIONING of the future of CSUF

April

 Campus-wide REFLECTION on goals for the next 5 years
